meanings.definition: Not forming or consisting of filaments.
meanings.sent1: The smooth surface of the balloon was nonfilamentous.
meanings.sent2: The plastic ruler was nonfilamentous and easy to clean.
meanings.sent3: The nonfilamentous clouds looked like fluffy cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfilamentous hair flowed freely in the wind, untangled and smooth.
meanings.sent5: The nonfilamentous fabric felt like silk against her skin, without any rough fibers.

meanings.sent1: The nonfilamentous plant had smooth leaves without any tiny hairs.
meanings.sent2: The nonfilamentous light bulb emitted a soft, even glow.
meanings.sent3: The nonfilamentous caterpillar wiggled along the ground, looking quite sleek.
meanings.sent4: His nonfilamentous fishing line glided through the water effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The nonfilamentous spider web shimmered in the sunlight, delicate and thread-free.
